mapper.select: select TABLE_NAME from user_tables where table_name like CONCAT(#{table},'%') and trim(translate(substr(table_name,-4,4),'0123456789.',' ')) is null ORDER BY TABLE_NAME DESC limit 0,1
select TABLE_NAME from user_tables where table_name like CONCAT(#{table},'%') and substr(table_name,-8,4) = #{year} ORDER BY TABLE_NAME DESC limit 0,1
select TABLE_NAME from user_tables where table_name like CONCAT(#{table},'%') and substr(table_name,-6,4) = #{year} ORDER BY TABLE_NAME DESC limit 0,1
select TABLE_NAME from user_tables where table_name like CONCAT(#{table},'%') and substr(table_name,-4,4) = #{year} ORDER BY TABLE_NAME DESC limit 0,1

select DIM_CLASS as dimClass, DIM_NAME as dimName, SUM_LAYER as sumLayer, DIM_VALUE as dimValue, DIM_LAYER as dimLayer, PREV_DIM_VALUE as prevDimValue from tpub_dim_class where DIM_CLASS = #{dimClass} and PREV_DIM_VALUE is null order by DIM_VALUE asc

select DIM_CLASS as dimClass, DIM_NAME as dimName, SUM_LAYER as sumLayer, DIM_VALUE as dimValue, DIM_LAYER as dimLayer, PREV_DIM_VALUE as prevDimValue from tpub_dim_class where DIM_CLASS = #{dimClass} and PREV_DIM_VALUE = #{preValue} order by DIM_VALUE asc

select DIM_CLASS as dimClass, DIM_NAME as dimName, SUM_LAYER as sumLayer, DIM_VALUE as dimValue, DIM_LAYER as dimLayer, PREV_DIM_VALUE as prevDimValue from tpub_dim_class where DIM_CLASS = #{dimClass} and DIM_LAYER = #{layer} order by DIM_VALUE asc
select unit_no as unitNo,unit_name as unitName from ${unitTableName} where UNIT_CLS_CODE = (select DIM_VALUE from tpub_dim_class where DIM_CLASS = 'edu_sch_unit_cls' and dim_name = '教学院系')
select distinct dpnd_topic as itemClassCode,dpnd_topic as itemClassName from ${itemTableName}
